Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for resolution model
Parameters:
modelType "Fixed", "Gaussian", "Lorentzian", etc
asymmetry "none", "left", etc
detectorObliqueness correction method 0=none, 1= yes
crystalPosition correction method 0=none, 1= yes
blockPosition correction method 0=none, 1= yes
FWHM for modelType=="Fixed", fixed resolution in mm
percentCutoff percent of max to cut tails
motionCorrectionUncertainty correction method 0=none, 1= yes
xtab_file full path of pre-saved resolution tablews
layer 
verbosity level of output
